name: Yeah Yeah Yeahs
description:
'''Yeah Yeah Yeahs''' are an American [[indie rock]] band formed in [[New York City]] in 2000. The group is composed of [[Karen O]] (vocals, piano), [[Nick Zinner]] (guitars, keyboards), and [[Brian Chase]] (drums). The band does not have a bassist but is complemented in live performances by second guitarist [[David Pajo]] and, previously, [[Imaad Wasif]].

Yeah Yeah Yeahs released their debut album, ''[[Fever to Tell]]'', in 2003, to widespread acclaim. Their second album, ''[[Show Your Bones]]'', came out in 2006, and their third, ''[[It's Blitz!]]'', followed in 2009. They issued ''[[Mosquito (Yeah Yeah Yeahs album)|Mosquito]]'' in 2013, and after a hiatus, their fifth album, ''[[Cool It Down]]'', came out in 2022. They have received four [[Grammy Awards|Grammy Award]] nominations for [[Grammy Award for Best Alternative Music Album|Best Alternative Music Album]], among other accolades.
